    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnimationManager
    AnimationManager - Centralizes all animation logic in the game.
    Board
    Board Interface - Defines the contract for game board implementations.
    BoardRenderer
    BoardRenderer - Renders the static game board background.
    Brick
    Brick - Interface defining the contract for Tetris brick pieces.
    BrickGenerator
    BrickGenerator - Interface for generating Tetris brick pieces.
    BrickRenderer
    BrickRenderer - Handles all brick rendering on the game board.
    BrickRenderer.ColorProvider
    Inner class for color management - separates color logic from rendering.
    BrickRotator
    BrickRotator - Manages brick rotation state and calculations.
    ClearRow
    ClearRow - Immutable data class containing line clear results.
    Constants
    Central configuration for all game constants.
    Constants.PieceColors
     
    DifficultyManager
    DifficultyManager - Manages game difficulty levels and their associated game speeds.
    DownData
    DownData - Data container for brick down movement results.
    EventSource
    EventSource - Enumeration indicating the source of a game move event.
    EventType
    EventType - Enumeration of possible game move actions.
    GameController
    Main Game Controller - Orchestrates game logic and state.
    GameOverPanel
    GameOverPanel - Displays the game over screen with visual feedback.
    GameStateManager
    GameStateManager - Manages game state with Observer pattern.
    GameStateManager.GameStateListener
    Observer interface for game state changes.
    GuiController
    Main GUI Controller for the Tetris game.
    InputEventListener
    InputEventListener - Interface for handling game input events.
    InputHandler
    InputHandler - Processes keyboard input and delegates to game logic.
    InputHandler.DefaultKeyBindingStrategy
    Default key binding strategy - Standard Tetris controls.
    InputHandler.KeyBindingStrategy
    Strategy interface for key bindings.
    InputHandler.UIEventListener
    Interface for UI-level event handling.
    Main
     
    MatrixOperations
    MatrixOperations - Utility class for 2D matrix operations in the game.
    MenuController
    MenuController - Controls the main game menu UI.
    MoveEvent
    MoveEvent - Immutable event class representing a game move action.
    NextShapeInfo
    NextShapeInfo - Immutable data class containing next brick information.
    NextThreeBricksInfo
    Container for the next 3 bricks that will fall
    NotificationPanel
    NotificationPanel - Displays notifications (score bonuses, line clears) with animation.
    ObstacleManager
    ObstacleManager - Manages obstacle generation and placement in Obstacle Mode.
    PauseMenuController
    PauseMenuController - Controls the pause menu UI during gameplay.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    RandomBrickGenerator - Generates random Tetris bricks using fair distribution.
    RowCollapseAnimator
    helper class that animates the collapse of rows by creating overlay rectangles representing the filled cells from the "before" board snapshot and translating them down to their new positions.
    Score
    Score - Manages the player's current score using JavaFX property binding.
    ScoreManager
    ScoreManager - Manages score display and high score tracking.
    SimpleBoard
    SimpleBoard - Implementation of the Board interface.
    ViewData
    ViewData - Immutable data class containing current game state for UI rendering.
